Posts.Content: Will be having my 1 year check up for ACC of the breast.  Just wondering what others have had done for their 1 year check up.  Have read material that a person should have bone & lung scans.  Just wondering.... Was told I had stage 1 ACC (due to size) but had tried without success for 3 years to tell doctors that something was in my breast.  Still a little scared...but am doing fabulous... Had radiation for treatment.
Posts.Title: going for 1st year checkup for ACC
